      • Serialized Fields

        • coinImage
          BufferedImage coinImage
          The image representing the coin icon.
        • numberImages
          Map<Character,BufferedImage> numberImages
          A map to store images of numbers 0-9 for displaying the coin count.
        • player
          Player player
          The player whose coins are being tracked.

          BufferedImage xSymbol
          The image representing the 'x' symbol.

  • Package game.levelLoader

    • Class game.levelLoader.GameView

      class GameView extends city.cs.engine.UserView implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundImage
          BufferedImage backgroundImage
          The background image displayed in the game view.
        • coinsCollected
          CoinsCollected coinsCollected
          The coins collected by the player displayed on the screen.
        • healthBar
          HealthBar healthBar
          The health bar displayed on the screen.
        • messageEndTime
          long messageEndTime
          The time when the temporary message should disappear.
        • paused
          boolean paused
          Indicates whether the game is paused.
        • player
          Player player
          The player character whose position is tracked by the camera.
        • temporaryMessage
          String temporaryMessage
          The message to be displayed temporarily on the screen.
        • timer
          Timer timer
          The timer displayed on the end screen.
